name: TechwireDailyBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Read by opinion leaders, policymakers, the vendor community and the government IT workforce, Techwire has a well-defined audience focused on the public-sector technology industry in California. We gather and publish news related to this community, documenting the efforts of those working to modernize California’s digital infrastructure.

Launched in 2011, Techwire is an independent website, not affiliated with any government agency or technology company. Support comes from sponsorship by nonprofit organizations and the technology companies listed on the homepage. In March 2014, Techwire was acquired by Government Technology publisher e.Republic Inc.


Editorial Staff

Dennis Noone, Managing Editor of Techwire, is a veteran journalist with a background in writing and editing local, state, national and political news for news organizations from California to Washington, D.C., including The Dallas Morning News and USA Today. He can be reached at dnoone@erepublic.com or (916) 932-1310.

Theo Douglas, Assistant Managing Editor at Techwire, is a former staff writer for Government Technology. He can be reached at tdouglas@erepublic.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
